lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons and Dragons--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome. Tonight should be an interesting episode, but, before we begin, let's go ahead and get through our announcements for the evening! So, welcome, and, first and foremost, tonight we are sponsored by our friends at Loot Crate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sam, did you want to tell us a little about--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay! I haven't done this in a while, so I'm falling back on an old crutch, an old beloved character-- Rhodey Slater is back to do another round--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: -- when he should be really spending more quality time with his children, as their youthful lives pass by without their father, precious moments ticking away until one day they're adults, and you're standing at their wedding, thinking, "Oh my god, I missed so much, I missed so very much, and for what? A Loot Crate ad?" Anyway, ride that tube and subscribe today, (shouting) bonzai! (all laugh and cheer)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You just Inception'd a Loot Crate ad.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You took, like, a failed Californian sketch and turned it into Oscar-winning material.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is, thank you very much.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I didn't know Rhodey's, Rhodey's a father, that's an interesting development.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just a heads-up, guys, we've done a couple of these and we're going to do a couple more of these upcoming For Honor streams, where a few of us are going to be guesting on here for a number of hours to play For Honor and beat the shit out of each other and other people, as various historical warriors of old. And then a number of us are actually, I think, a voice in the game.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But yeah. So tomorrow, joining the Nerdist team from 9 am to 12 noon Pacific Time, we have Liam and Travis--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: --to jump in on there, and then, on Saturday, from 12 noon to 3 pm, that's going to be Travis, Taliesin, Sam, Marisha, and myself on there--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: MATT:-- all playing the game, getting crazy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He would know. He would know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) So yeah, it'll be here on the Twitch, check it out, I'm really excited, I haven't played the game yet? And everyone I know who's talked about has said it's ridiculously fun and amazing. It's like, the upgrade of Dark Souls combat and I'm really excited about it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going to get killed a lot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We've got to work on our death sounds.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What, I'm Leet, man, you're going down, and stuff.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. No. You... are the one falling, in the opposite direction of up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: --we're doing our impression of Troy, doing an impression of Nolan doing Walken.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't even know what Walken sounds like, it's come through a daisy-chain of assholes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Daisy Chain of Assholes." I'm okay with that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: -- and a Daisy Chain of Assholes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right! Next up, we have (quieter) me, breaking my pen. Uh--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're allowed to say the date now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We do now. That's all the information we have so far, but April 1st, WonderCon. Critical Role and Talks Machina live, in their--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- big room, it's gonna be good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Big room, did I say square?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It is not an epic April Fools' Joke--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And it's going to be a big, big, rowdy room. So if you're like, "Aw, I don't want to go, there's not going to be any seats." There gon' be seats.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: --It's April Fools', we're not going to be there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're not going to do that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will promise that I will play at least one April Fools' joke on one of you, during that panel.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think that's a great idea.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's not listening to this right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't actually do that, please. 'Cause we all know that's going to be--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm a big fan of Brian, I have a feeling that's a good bet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Isn't it, though? All right! Next up--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Signal Boost has returned. Marisha, if you want to talk about that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, my goodness, you guys! The amazing Darin De Paul, already. He kicked off the season.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes. Yeah, he kind of set the bar really high.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You guys know Darin as the voice of Reinhardt from Overwatch, and many other things. But--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's also the main villain, Ardyn, in Final Fantasy XV and a bunch of other games. Super talented--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's blowing up! He's in everything now!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think he's rude. And he smells funny.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He didn't want to come on my show, Siggle Boost.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wow, I haven't heard of that one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you guys just like draw weird circles?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Right, okay. I was just checking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And people correct you for mispronouncing it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's run the GIF (hard g) of that now, please.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, it's back. You should watch it. Yup.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, Erika Ishii just did hers--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: --and then Amy Dallen's up next, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Amy Dallen is up next and--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. It's good people coming up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, but you can only do it once, though.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a great trick. You can only do it once.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Laura, do you have a merch update?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We watched Galaxy Quest last night.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So good. Again. For, like, the hundredth time. You know, I mean, there's merch in the store right now. These dice bags that I'm holding in my hand. I literally just happened to be holding it as you asked me that, which is crazy. There's a very small amount of them left, I happen to know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In the hundreds? In the fifties? In the tens?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Which, you know, could be a lot or couldn't. Depending on if you want them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's also shirts! And hats! And patches and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: -- other stuff coming up that I'm real excited about, and I'll show it to you when it's here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't need that-- he can have that many. You have too many.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You know they have the dubbed version of the alien language on the DVD?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (alien noises) The whole movie, the entire movie-- You can watch it, if you're drunk enough.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anything else anyone wants to talk about? Or are we good? I think we're good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So we're going to hop in, and start off tonight's episode of--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, to get you up to speed with our current story: Vox Machina, having just completed the destruction of the Chroma Conclave, a scourge of ancient chromatic dragons that have terrorized the countryside. They are victorious, yet in the process lost a couple of lives. Percy returned and Scanlan, his lifeless body brought back to Whitestone. They completed the ritual correctly, and he came to life; however, he remains unconscious in a pseudo-coma. They left him in Whitestone, hopefully to recover. While beginning to finish up some of their last business they've been unable to with the current rush of this current arc. They made a journey to Vasselheim, where they walked through the Abundant Terrace and into the Birthheart itself, the temple of Melora within Vasselheim, spoke with one of the various worshippers there, and buried a box of ashes, apparently, of Senokir's wife--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Returning to the Trial Forge, the temple to Kord, and upon walking to the center of the strangely empty temple structure, you saw, down in a once previously traversed sandpit, there stood Earthbreaker Groon, the high priest of Kord, who then turned to you--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: --and asked you to "show him what you had learned." After slamming his feet into the sand and preparing himself for conflict, he beckons you towards him. And that is where we left off. So--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god, oh god, oh god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: --as you're standing up there on the edge of this pit, Groon just stands there with his hand beckoning towards you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's not what I wanted. And I take out the Dwarven Thrower and I jump into the sandpit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. (jumping sound) (impact thud) There, as you land in the sand, the bottoms of your boots sinking but a couple of inches into the soft surface. Pike gets ready to leap down after and Groon puts his hand up. "No...."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we're here, we're watching it, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys didn't say if you were catching up with them last time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we said we came in the temple with them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Uh, no, we're totally watching this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all rush in on the outskirts here to watch. I'll put you in over here to keep an eye on the sidelines. Grog, I need you to roll initiative.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Big roll! Big money, no whammies.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Now we attack on the count of three.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, second has its advantages sometimes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you land and ready yourself with the hammer at the side, knowing that all of your friends are up on the outer edges of this watching you, you look up at Groon, who just, his hands at the ready, puts them down at his sides and just.... (slow steps)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just walks up towards you... And just stands there. Your turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I smash the Titanstone Knuckles together.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty! (laughs) Off to a start.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, yeah. Is there popcorn in the studio?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Always the bearer of bad news, that one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't say her name three times, then your rolls won't come true.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would like to move backwards three squares.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. On his turn he stands there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is-- It's a test already!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Waiting for you to go first?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I hate the SATs! I hate Scantrons, I hate number two pencils, I hate all of it! (all laugh)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't blink, don't blink. Roll with it, player.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I start in that same distance from him, the same radial distance, I start walking to my right. My full speed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "What do you want me to do!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "Are you hungry? I'm kind of hungry."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And then I chuck it at him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As you slam it into your chest, you can feel the impact, and there's that brief sharp bit of pain as the metal clashes against the muscle, slamming against the bone and your rib cage. And that pain just kind of shoots through you like exciting electricity and you harness the pain as your eyes blur for a moment as you feel the rage overtake you, your muscles flexing and tensing and with that fury now flowing through your body, you take the hammer. I need you to go ahead and make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (whispers) I knew it. (louder) I mean, I didn't know it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which is a minus two, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not that I'd know. Cool. Do I have another attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Roll another wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know D&D enough to know what the fuck's happening right now. Ooh! 16?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Uh, 16, actually let me see this real fast.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have a modifier of zero. Minus two.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Monks are not in my wheelhouse.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel like this guy's special, too.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's not even here. This is a dream.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Slowly, Raishan uncurls like a Xenomorph from the ceiling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's something about his presence right now that is oppressing your ability to actually attack towards him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. All I have is my bonus action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you used your bonus action to rage, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh I did, yeah. I don't have a bonus action. That's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. He turns towards you. Walks forward--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh man. What does he want-a!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I try and hit him with it with both hands.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you you're using both hands--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Look at his little boy smile.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go to swing and he seems to blur for a moment, your eyes blink and as you swing with the hammer, you swung far to your left and it's almost like your arms are intentionally missing and almost fighting your directoral sense.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is so stupid! Okay, I keep the hammer in one hand but I just try and punch him with the Titanstone Knuckles out of frustration.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? No weapon in my hand?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Come at me!" Are you going to move or are you going to stay where you are?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to stay within his attack range, but I'm going to 180 around him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. For his turn, he turns around--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No he doesn't. Come on. Come on.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. All right. Maybe it's all about love! And I try and give him a bear hug!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay... make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go to grab him, and you reach, and you feel this physical form in your grasp, and then your arms all of a sudden touch nothing, and you realize that he's standing where he was. You grabbed what was almost like a mirage or an illusion, it's almost like your brain is playing tricks on you. That's one attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can do it, Grog! I don't know what he wants, but figure it out!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I look so pathetic right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yo, how does it look to the rest of the gang?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's hilarious, and it's disconcerting, because you're watching as Grog, in the middle of his rage, most of his attacks are amateur, far too wide away from the target, or by the time they get close, he is holding himself back. And you don't know why. Something is messing with his will and preventing him from being able to follow through with his attacks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Second attack. I just want to touch him with my finger. Just, like, a boop.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You reach out and your finger touches his chest (cracking sound), and you feel--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, now ramp it up! (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He smiles at you and goes, "And with gentleness there comes clarity."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "With gentleness there comes clarity." And he smiles through his big, white-grey beard. And then the smile fades, his eyes flash, and he is going to attack you with a flurry of blows.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, I haven't learned the lesson yet. I'm still--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that is a failure. And it's a 32 to hit, so he hits you three times.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're raging, so you take half damage from these, because they're bludgeoning, since he's punching you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is 15 bludgeoning damage, halved to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is nine, reduced to five, and that is 13 reduced to seven. There you go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a really good British candy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do monks do? Can I, like, use my magic powers? And I want to keep my eyes closed, and I'm gonna swing around behind me, knowing that I just got kicked in the back there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and make an attack with disadvantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You touched him, maybe if you'd've shaken his hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With disadvantage, because you have your eyes closed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So what did we learn from that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I should've done it reckless. No, I don't want him rolling reckless, holy shit! God, I'll die in a second.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, that-- close your eyes-- or, how does this... what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You feel the weapon behind you make contact with a form, and (cracking noise), you see a little bit of sand out of your peripheral this side go (scattering sound) as his form gets pushed about a foot, kind of setting some of it off.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So it goes (low hitting sound). I close my eyes again. I swing around the other way, and I try to connect.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, okay. Damn, same thing, so 18 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He kind of gives you a bit of a narrowed glare--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Little bit of a stink eye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But like an intentional kind of connecting point and just says--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's the lesson? What's the lesson?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That hits, yeah, it's my AC.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that is ten, so five damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And he's going to spend three ki.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get to make an attack of opportunity if you'd like.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't forget, you can use your reaction to get an attack back because of your retaliation ability.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All these sounds are in game, in character.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I feel all shake-weighty at the moment, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't feel bad, it's just this kind of uneasiness in your body.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I take a step towards him?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does anything happen? Do I shit my pants?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I take the other four steps of the five step exploding heart point technique thing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What would you have done if you shat your pants on that fifth step?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, that would have been amazing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Kill me now, take it away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) I'd have to bring out the cone template for that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like a very dedicated marathon runner.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I close the rest of the distance to him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So, go ahead. And I think it's your athletics versus his--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So I can touch him now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The wisdom saving throw was something in the beginning.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I think it was, you have to shake his hand or do something, like, gentle to him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I like the idea that it's silent in here and we're just hearing sand get kicked around and Grog breathing like a bull.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like to think that Earthbreaker Groon has, like, mood music for his fights.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (joins in on the drum sounds) Totally.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, okay, so you go to grab him and he just (fwish) slips out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn. My athletics versus his? Judo?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He just kind of like parries it to the side, ducks under and rights himself, just out of your grasp.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cool, that was nice. Do I have a second attack?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you, god. No it doesn't, 24 minus five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, minus five. So, as you go to swing, both of your hands on the hammer, (grunts) giant downward arc. As it slams downward, you see his form (whoosh) shift, and suddenly he's two feet to the right. He moved so fast with the side step, and you slam it down into the sand. You guys watch as this crater emerges (boom), and the sand shoots off the sides from the impact of Grog's blow on the ground. Groon seemingly unaffected.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope. That ends my turn. Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. At the end of your turn, he's going to go ahead and make an unarmed attack on you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's just his punch as a part of his legendary action here. That is a 27 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You suffer another ten points of bludgeoning damage, reduced to five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's gonna go ahead and make another series of attacks on you. That is an 18?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, say nine points of bludgeoning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then--ooh! 18. So another nine points of bludgeoning damage. I need you to go ahead and make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21, okay. As his first hit is a long round haymaker punch across the chin, he comes from underneath and goes for an uppercut that hits you right in the jaw. Right at the side where usually it would snap and really mess with somebody's ability to stay either conscious or control their atmosphere. You just manage to maneuver out of the way where it hurts, but the impact doesn't hit its intended place, and you resist the effect.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll shit my pants before this fight is over with.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My turn. I am so tired of this slippery shit. I go into a frenzied rage!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, thank you. I would like to Great Weapon Master try to hit him with the Dwarven Thrower.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. (crying) I don't know what the lesson is. 32 minus five is 37.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. This one cracks him right across the side of his shoulder and pec area (wham), and you watch as for the first time since this battle started, he loses his footing, and he has to catch himself behind. His head looks back and he turns around towards you and a big smile goes across his face as he goes, "Good. Keep showing me."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was encouraged until he got creepy with the talking.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe he just likes getting hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, I hit him again!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's gonna hit. That's a 31 minus five is 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's got like 5,000 hit points. More than last time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's life without a little spice?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Close to what I wanted. This is 33.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, cool. All right, so, as you unleash your next series of blows against him, you saw him topple from the first hit. The other two, he pulls his arms in and takes them, one to the shoulder, and the other one hits him in the stomach (air getting knocked out) and he grabs your arm, and pushes off. Jumps in the air and lands about five feet from you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is he bruised? Is there a slap mark? I mean, is there any blood? Anything to tell me that I might be doing a good job?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks, more so than the previous fight that you had with him, it looks like he's starting to take some hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's gonna use Legendary Action to take a hit on you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that is another nine points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not halved. That is what it is halved.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And says, "Your size is useful for those who know not how to use it against you." And he rushes down, beneath your large standing form, and goes into a series of strikes against the inside of your knees and your legs and we'll see how the last blow hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've been forgetting to roll my enlarged damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a 30 on the first hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a 21 on the second hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a 29 on the third hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vegas is a short trip this time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that is 18 reduced to half; that's nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a nine reduced in half is five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And final strike is a 20. Reduced in half, that is ten.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I use my Stone's Endurance on that last one?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's 12. Plus my constitution, which is five, so 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And I would like you to make another constitution save.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit! So do I add 17 hit points back?

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You've learned much... and Kord smiles upon you." As you look up and you hear the roiling again, and two bolts come streaming out of the top of the temple down towards Grog. And slamming into your body, you instinctually pull down and hunker, as an animal in a thunderstorm would, but you feel the warmth as your gauntlets all of a sudden flash with electrical energy. And you look down as the runes on all the sides, and the chains are now glowing with divine energy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Groon is still standing there, looking up at you, and just goes: "Continue with your journey." And just looks at you, waiting for some kind of response.

lines.name: TRAVIS

And you watch, from all the different corners of the empty temple, all the priests of Kord begin to wander back in, who had exited previously, as was the request, it seems, of Earthbreaker Groon, knowing that you were coming.

lines.name: MATT
