lines.text: Double damage on objects and structures.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But that's a lot of resistance to a lot of things. And 26 is... that's really strong.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26 is good. It's two more than what you had, so everything goes up plus one damage to hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My armor does that too, but it only makes me smell bad, it doesn't affect me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, picking up where we left off, Vox Machina is now exiting the Trial Forge into the Braving Grounds, Grog with the recently reinforced Titanstone Gauntlets by the strength of Kord through your duel with Earthbreaker Groon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do they do Grog? What do they do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I dunno. You know what, we'll probably have to fight somebody to find out, let's find the first person outside of here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe we can find an old building and you can just destroy it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's just a kitten going-- (mimes punching a kitten)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And that's how Grog was beaten to death by a purse.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It is technically one point. He may go down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, an old lady trying to cross the street and takes out Grog.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have the hit points of a kitten right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right, well, I do-- I am fond of cats.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm pretty sure a kitten has less hit points than that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We worked out the math at one point.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Five is way too many. At level one you can have five hit points as a person.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's like two hit points, it's going to be a very tough kitten.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean if you're a wizard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What we're saying is 'kitten' is the baseline hit point counter in Dungeons and Dragons, everybody.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can we count hit points in kitten strength for now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, I'm going to use three hit dice, I'm at 12 kittens.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And that's what the air machines run on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was really hard to not.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, no, I did, did you not see?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Your back was turned for so much of the time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I mean, we're outside. All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm so sad Scanlan wasn't here for this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, he would've loved that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like we should go celebrate and drink, but it wouldn't feel right without him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I need like a million potions, and maybe some attractive naked women to heal me back to my full health.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It has been a while for you, hasn't it, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Yeah. I'm real cranky so I need bandages, and maybe some bondage, and just all the women.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.. that's exactly what B & B means.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How long has Scanlan been out for?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Uh, at this point in time Scanlan's been out for almost a day.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Gosh. I'd like to go get him, but I really want him to wake up on his own accord.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, we can try head back to Whitestone and get Grog healed up and check up on Scanlan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think that would be good. Maybe get some potions before we head out here, because everyone's low. I'll just stop by the store and pick some health potions from where we got them before.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There are nice stores here, and we haven't even proper shopped in a while.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's true. Vasselheim hasn't been touched, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From what you know of the Conclave, no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean we've got fucking shit to sell--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: -- and stuff to buy, but that's kind of a thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or we should check out the stuff that we got out of the den where Raishan was.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We should definitely do the research.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That creepy-ass book we need to look at.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is Scanlan sleeping it off? I mean, we're in Vasselheim, we've just bamfed across miles and miles. We're here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, yeah, it's fine, it's fine, I'm just fucking sitting here, no big deal.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, it's fine, I'm having a great dream.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I wonder what Scanlan would say if he were here right now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fucking come back and get me! (all laugh)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do quick shopping and then head home and look at all the things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A quick buying of potions, I just wanna see if I can get some stuff.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I should've just shaken that instead of just--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And these two bouncers kind of step--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you the cart guy? Fucking who--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't abuse him. Everyone else abused him. I was very kind to you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your business is not welcome here, goodbye.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Excuse me, has anyone seen my friend Ve-- You.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: -- beautiful salesman, carrier of all delightful things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: See! We're friends, we're all friends here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Was he uncomfortable seeing you or something?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Said he didn't like me very much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you want from me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We can do business. We cannot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, I'll just stand next to him while you do business with him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not welcome in my establishment.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm really hard of hearing. Like, I've been working--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, it's just muffled, it's just muffled for him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (huffs) "Well, our stocks have been running low since last time you came through, we don't have much!" He puts up a small leather case and opens it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It is such a shame. Did you tell him already that we have a whole kingdom's worth of jewelry and gold to spend, and I'm really tired of carrying it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It is so unfortunate. We are saviors of Emon, saviors of the world, really, and he doesn't even care.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought I'd lighten this backpack a little.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I really don't care. I have four healing potions and one greater. That is all I have.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's it. You want it? No? Then good day.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know, I don't like him, I don't even want to buy it from him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, Grog, please don't. Don't shop without me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm just gonna yell at him really loud.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no, I'm standing here. I can't let you do this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Could you please just escort them out--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How much? For the four healing potions and the one greater?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know, me personally, if that is a good amount. But Vex would know, is that a good amount or is that a shit amount?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Based on your previous dealings with this individual, the fact that you are getting a price at all--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But it's not a good price.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not a good market price, but it's also a buyer's market right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know how to do this. I take a bag of gold--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: -- pour it onto the desk. Just a pile of gold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog, do not do this. Please, please, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just scoop it back into your little-- hold out your pouch.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you not want healing potions, or what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He starts putting them back into the leather case. (huffs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think those aren't even real healing potions, I think those are probably water colored--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I mean, clearly I have to say they have worked.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Probably yes, you're right. They are colored liquid of no particular worth. You're right, leave. Begone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I lean in the door and say, you've been in there long enough to pay rent, what is going on?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vax, will you come in here a minute?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Will you please tell your sister that we have enough money to fund several townships, and that this guy wants 1500 gold for four healing potions and we have almost none.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And a greater healing potion! Five healing potions really.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is she being a pain in the arse?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're not begging in Stillben. Will you give the guy some fucking coin so we can get the fuck out of here?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My time is valuable. Will you pay him so we can go, please?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know, stiff upper lip, pip-pip.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So glad I'm not in this room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There you are. C'mon Grand Poobah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All he hears is fart noises, and I grab her by the mouth and I drag her out the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well. Enjoy your day, and I'd be wary of keeping her as your business contact. She's a bit abrasive."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I noticed. You've moved up in the world, this is really nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm sharing it with a few folks, it's sort of a partnership, but yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it working out for you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, I've had to hire bodyguards, if that's any indication.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If I wanted your name, like if I wanted to call on you later, 'cause it seems like-- As far back as I can remember, we've run into you quite a bit, and I'm kind of fond of this--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, just a couple of times. Just a couple of times.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Do you have a name?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: By the way, did you have any--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's the guy. That took advantage of Grog

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That took all the money from him?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: --limited exclusive items and, like, top shelf. Your most elite, (clicks tongue) paying customers only?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I just generally run the realm of healing balms and salves.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: My partner does a bit more than that, but he is out currently picking up a shipment and will be back in a few days. Try back then.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did he come out? I thought he came out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, he walked into the door with Vex.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're at the window. When's he coming back?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where's he getting his shipment from? Do you trust your partner? This new guy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I do, and I don't trust you enough to tell you this information.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I give him ten gold for the information.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, that is very generous. I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He gives the ten gold back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Look, I know that was hard for you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog, he took advantage of you before--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, look, his hands were on that side of the counter the whole time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, here, these are for you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I don't want any, I need more of the hands-on healing, you know what I'm saying?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I cast Cure Wounds on him. Level four, bitch!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's like if you gave him an ice cream, you see me running around on a sugar high for the rest of the day. Never gonna burn that off.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, the Makey Mace-- the Mickey Mouse-shaped one?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Those were great, with the ears.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm all right. Give it to others.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, we could take a short rest and let me heal up for a second. Once we land somewhere.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You wanna rest in the tavern?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But didn't you need to go somewhere?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then I pass out the other healing potions between--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where I have to go is a little more involved.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you gonna slide by the temple?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I scoop you by the arm and take you off for a minute. You know, I want to come back here, sometime. One, I would love to go to the Velvet Cabaret again. You know, just like a date night.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that was great. Yeah, that was fu--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, but without somebody trying to kill us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'd like to go back without somebody trying to murder any of us, though.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That aside, I do have to go to the temple, but I don't want to go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why are you saying it like you have to go to the toilet?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 'Cause that's kind of what it's like.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, there is another shoe that's gonna drop, probably, eventually.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You should probably pass that, I think.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I don't walk by. I just-- I'm amazed that no one remembers that we can hear everything over these earpieces.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, you have to be touching your ear.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, you have to hit send, my friend.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I'm not ready for that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What are you afraid of? What do you think she's gonna ask of you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You think she's gonna cash in on that bargain?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought you already considered paid up in a way. I don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But I feel like being a little selfish and taking a little time, and when she wants me-- 'cause she's not talking to me at the moment-- when she wants me, she'll call. So I'd like a little time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. What are you asking of me right now?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just to come back, down the road.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What you're proposing is a Raven Queen-slash-Velvet date night visit back to Vasselheim?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I don't know what's gonna happen at the--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like, you go to church and then we go to the casino?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'd probably do it the other way around?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, the fact that any of us are still doing that is impressive at this point.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Let's at least go see if little lover boy has woken up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure. Are you sure you don't wanna just hop in the Raven's Spa, tonight?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So, do you wanna get back to Whitestone?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you okay? You're a little-- you look a little sweaty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I'm fine. I'm fine. I'm fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That little vein on the side of your forehead--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know what? We've made a lot of money, and--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you've got the Julia Roberts vein going. (laughs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Everything's fine. Except Scanlan's still unconscious, so maybe we should go see if he's all right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're right, you're right, all right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's go. Let's go. Everything's fine here too, by the way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good, good, you guys didn't seem awkward at all while I walked up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tree. A tree? Can you still do a Tree Stride?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We gotta leave the city, though, right? Out of respect.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I don't think we have to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's not like-- It's not like showy wizard magic.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: These rules confuse me, but okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The wizard magic is like Broadway musicals?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. It's like jazz hands. And druid magic is like modern dance.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If wizardry is Bob Fosse, druidism is Twyla Tharp.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay? Let's go back to Whitestone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. So you find your way back to the Abundant Terrace, where you find a similar-sized tree, to what you arrived in. Using Transport Via Plants, you transport yourself back to Whitestone, stepping out of the Sun Tree. Make your way--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where else, you would like to within Whitestone?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It does not make that sound. That's what you're trying to do. It does not sound like that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They don't. Trees don't fart, they poot, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's the air ashari, man. So what were you saying?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I start heading towards the castle.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: On the way there, I ask Percy, Percy! Percy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know this city's, like, being rebuilt and everything--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: -- but do you think there will ever be like a pleasure hall, or a house of, you know, bosoms. I mean, I just want to put out like a couple ideas as a city, bound up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Of course it has one. Do I happen to know where it is, or do I not?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope, yeah, it's pretty empty right now, I know this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel like it would be the sort of thing that would have just existed for fuck all ever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whitestone has had-- there's generally-- There were two brothels, one was destroyed, in the Briarwoods' run.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is one called the House of Bosoms?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like the House of Cards of porno.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll come up with something better.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With all the flags on it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And six different syrups to choose from in each room.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't even know if I would know this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know what? Make a history check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a natural twenty, with my history is--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've never been to it, but you recall one of your older brothers who is of age did return and tell stories of a house of--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't recall its name, but you know that it existed somewhere on the western side of this city, and within a short period of time, you could lead him to it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And also that they serve a pancake with-- (all laugh)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: -- some chocolate chips and a smiley face.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The ancient Sumerians would pay for sex with silver dollars.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know if such a thing exists.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But I'm just saying, you know, if you need to lean on me to develop that sort of the economy again, I'm here for you buddy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I wonder if he's awake yet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Search for him. Wherever he might be.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where did we leave him, again?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think strapped up and covered in mayonnaise.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys find your way back to castle Whitestone, upwards to Scanlan's room. The door's partially ajar. On the inside you see Kaylie is actually asleep. She's sitting on a stool next to the bed and her head's down, and she's very lightly snoring. And there, in the bed, as you left him, is Scanlan.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've had people taking care of that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And Kaylie's sitting in the chair, or is she leaning back on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, she's leaning back in a chair and is passed out. Scanlan is still on the bed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I please knock the legs of the chair out?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's seven children in this family, I think they're used to some tomfoolery.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. I walk over and I just kick the back leg of the chair out so she falls down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh right, I forgot, you'll speed bag my nuts later, sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But your eyes begin to blink, and you guys watch as Scanlan begins to stir.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How long has he been like this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why is he covered in pudding?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keyleth takes a little bit of the gunk off and what is it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look. How do you think druids discover things, okay? Someone has to figure out what's poison and what's not.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is funny. This is funny, was this you? This is funny!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's going on, where am I?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is the afterlife, Scanlan, you've gone to the good place.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your hands are bound up over your head currently, and you are dressed in a nightgown and your room and yourself are, there's spatters of pudding everywhere.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's going on? Why am I like this? Where am I?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, you killed it, and then we all celebrated, and you had a big orgy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you proposed to this woman downstairs and this was your bachelor party.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You clearly have some very intense dreams, Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you hear Kaylie's voice, "Oh, you think that? Probably right true."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, apparently your friends brought me along to make sure that you woke up nice and right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where are-- are we in Whitestone?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And the dragon is very dead. Very, very dead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But you are not. And that's very important.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kaylie, could you excuse us a moment?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She goes, "Don't take too long. I've a mind to speak to you in a minute."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sure." She just kind of storms past and pushes, a little gnome figure pushing through the crowd of Vox Machina, and out of the room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sorry I... fell again. Can someone answer me one thing, though? Who got Kaylie? Who brought Kaylie here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, it just seemed like the logical thing to do, dear.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why the fuck would you do that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You thought that was a good idea?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What! Would you rather she just discover it on her own? This way she--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No! I'd rather she never know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan. She came here. She helped bring you back. You know what that means, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You think it's bad that she cares about you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think it's bad that she thinks that I'm an oathbreaker, that I am weak, that I failed in my promise to her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That everything she thought of me when she found me is confirmed now. That I can't be trusted, and I can't protect her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan. She thought nothing of you when you met her, all right? The fact that she showed up here and saw that you gave your life for a greater cause? That's so much more important than any promise you made.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And after the fact she stayed here and looked after you!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You should have heard her play.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I did. I think. I heard music. I heard Pike.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's nothing to sneeze at, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She also knows that I fell and that my friends thought it would be funny to put me in a fucking nightgown and spread pudding all over me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I made a promise, and I broke it, and you proved it to her. And I wish you hadn't meddled in my affairs. I don't have... I don't have many things that I care about, and I don't have anything that cares about me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What? You think you care about me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's be honest with each other. You don't really give a shit about me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've changed my outlook on life because of you! What the fuck are you talking about? Of course we all love you--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: -- you could crush me in a second.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you want us to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's her name? My father. Is he alive or dead? How old am I? Where's my fucking dog?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And that's okay, because I can take care of myself.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You don't have to, Scanlan. Nobody knew that any of this was going on. How many times have we asked you if you're all right and you just laugh and joke? We can't help you if you don't tell us what's going on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't like that very much at all.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Get used to it. Nobody likes needing someone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scanlan, do you think any of us could have gotten here without each other? I thought you knew that more than the rest of us. Maybe we just thought you didn't need us as much as you felt like we didn't.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I thought you were the only one who had everything figured out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well then, I must be a very good liar.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I thought for months, what haven't I got figured out that Scanlan has got figured out? I've been trapped in the mud for months, wondering what I could do to get where you are. Scanlan, you fucking saved the world with us. If your daughter can't see that, then she can't see anything.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. If you really respected me, you wouldn't pick me up like some sort of dwarf and pick me up and put me down and take off your fucking armor and treat me like a fucking child.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know what that is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scanlan. Do you wish we wouldn't have brought you back? Should we not have done that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just wish you wouldn't have brought her into this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I had one shot with her, and now how will I ever show her that I can be trusted? How will I ever show her that I can protect her?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, maybe you should fucking talk to her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you're a better father than most of us have ever had.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're right. I should talk to her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I should! I should. And I will.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't treat her like a fucking sacred object, treat her like a daughter, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll talk to her. Listen. I don't know what adventure we're going on next, but I think you should go without me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I should just be her father and stay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I ask you a question?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. No, I will not go whoring with you one more time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. I was gonna ask you what your mother's name is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm sorry I didn't know that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Made things, I don't know. His name is Vicou.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm glad you're back. Whatever you want to do now that you are... it's up to you, mate.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm sorry if we had selfish intentions.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Grog knows what I'm trying to say.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It may not feel like much, to us it feels like a bit, but now that you're here...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scanlan, as much as you can say that you were just the funny guy who played music and made jokes, I don't think you realize how desperately we need that. That's nothing to scoff at, that's not a talent that many of us naturally possess. You've taught me so much about the brightness of the world, and to look at the light side of things.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I guess it's just easier to laugh at the world when you don't care about it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's not true. You do care.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's why he's an asshole now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you know Thordak killed her?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I didn't push into your private life. If you wanted to talk to me, and you did, about your daughter. We did. We talked in the sewers of Westruun about your daughter because you wanted to talk about her. We love you, Scanlan, and if you want to talk about your mother or your father, we will. You have not been exactly forthcoming.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have to take care of myself. That's all.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I did not. I died. Twice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've been brought back. You're standing here. Your daughter is there and needs you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm being kept alive by some fucked-up weird magic. Before I met you people, I would have never-- the worst I would have gotten in is a bar fight. And I would have won. 'Cause I would have been a liar and a cheater. And now, I didn't help any of you in the last fight. I didn't do anything. The fight before that, I didn't do anything--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What about the fight before that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I encourage you to do it. But don't lie to yourself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, that's just it. I'm a really good liar.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (timidly) Hey-- hey, guys? We're friends, right? Are we friends?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And for fuck's sake, sir, I will say I died in that fight too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Be a man. Be a man. I've seen you be a man, I know you can fucking do it. And when you're done with that, and we will leave you with that fucking shit girl, I would like you to look up my parents' name. You can find it on every fifth hallway in this fucking city. And then I'm out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (clears throat) Okay. As you push the door open-- it's still partially ajar-- and as you push it open, leaning against the wall just by the door is Kaylie, and you can see she has tears streaming down her face.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I give her a big hug, a kiss on the forehead--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She doesn't let you. As soon as you go for it, she just kind of smacks it away--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Slings it over her shoulder, grabs her violin case. "So, you coming?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Grab your things. Be waiting for you downstairs." And she walks out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where're you going to go? What're you going to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And... it's great being part of a team, but you gotta know who you are first. So I gotta go figure that out. And I gotta go figure out what she is, too. And when I do, I'll come back and find you. And if you really need a place to stay, I'll advise you to buy some tents, 'cause you won't have a mansion anymore. I know you'll be fine 'cause you all have each other, but for now, I just need to have me for a while. I love you all. I even love Percy... and his parents, Frederick and Johanna. And I'll go with Kaylie.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait. I reach into the Bag of Holding and I grab my salt-lick rock and I toss it to Scanlan.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's yours now. When you miss us-- I know you will-- give it a lick.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I grab the Gatestone off the end table where we left it with him and hand it over to you as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'd rather it go to you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: When Vex tries to give you something, you take it. All right. Don't die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As he walks down the hall, you hear his feet across the stonework echo quieter and quieter until you can't hear it anymore, and you all stand in stunned silence in the chamber.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just pick up a pillow and throw it at the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It opens slightly. The pillow lays on the ground smattered with vanilla pudding.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did he take all his things with him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would say he would've grabbed his things as he left, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, that didn't go like I thought it would.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kinda wish we would've gone drinking in Vasselheim now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We might've missed him if we had.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (wearily) We saved the continent, why does everything feel like shit?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's alive. That's what really matters.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just... think we've all just discovered that maybe we have a lot more secrets about ourselves than we've all ever let on.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He needs time. We have that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (angrily) Fuck him! Fuck him for not saying anything sooner.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And fuck us for not asking. (sniffs)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think Percy's right. We're worse than friends, we're family. And family leaves.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we not be family? Can we, like, redact that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't think so. I think it's too late.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I step out into the hallway. Do I see Percy at all?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm around the corner, up on the--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm outside of-- If you went far enough, you'd see me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you have any, like, sneaky people in your employ here in the castle.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wouldn't you feel better if we had someone just keeping an eye on them? Bit explosive, the two of them together.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm torn. I don't know if he'd like that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know if I care. (laughs)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know if I do, either. I keep thinking, I could just shout right now and half a dozen guards would stop them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. It'd be half a dozen dead guards, though.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, what's half a dozen dead guards these days?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's tale of a brothel in the west end of Whitestone. I don't know if it still exists but I'm sure if you go drinking in that area, you might find something. Sorry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, yeah. Yeah. I'll go give it a look.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now's good. Yeah, I'll be back after nightfall. Gonna go out for a bit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know much, but I do know that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's nice having an older brother again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So what, just-- the half-elves are left alone in a room covered in pudding?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think 'crying in your pudding' is actually a British saying.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you think that if we would've not covered the room in pudding, that he would have stayed?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, he seemed pretty pissed that I went and got Kaylie, even though he ran away with her at the first chance he had.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And you had to stay in a shitty BnB, a brothel and-- (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see that Pike is still kinda shaking her fist in the corner right now. She doesn't say anything during this whole exchange.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He needs to do this... Right? He needs to do this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do we need to do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need to get a drink.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. We could always go back to Vasselheim and pick up on that little drinking.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not gonna go anywhere, Keyleth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't wanna go back to Vasselheim.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, we can drink anywhere. Vasselheim doesn't have to be in that equation.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I just want to be away from here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And before too long, we have a demon who wants you and I dead in the night. We have to deal with it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pike, you know the Ozmit Sea. You've sailed it, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's been a while, but yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We might need you for the water ashari.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Seems like-- I guess all of us are picking up on our own individual paths from here? I guess.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Why can't we still help each other out?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We can. Of course we can. Pike...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His path is his own. He has to do his thing alone. We don't have to be alone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's been a long couple of months.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is Scanlan right? Have we become too close to each other? Do we need to all take our individual time like we've done in the past?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know that she's my best friend, right? You know that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know that I'm in love with her, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What are you getting at, Vax?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you have anything that you're holding in? You're in love with Percival. We all know that, right? It's plain as day, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My take-away from Scanlan is that we all talk too much. And I leave the room.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then I look at Vax and Percy, and say--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: --Pike, and say: And my takeaway is that maybe we were forgetting who we were before we all banded together. And then I leave the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, they're all just congregating in the next chamber.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's like a Black Mirror episode

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike kinda walks up to you as they walk out of the room and puts her gauntleted hand on your shoulder and just says, "We all make mistakes, I make 'em a lot."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have a lot of other people to look up to, aside from just me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Me too. (sighs) Let's get a drink.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's get a drink. You wanna go in town?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I chase down Vex, and we do the same thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I came to give Sam a hug.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's not, actually. I don't know where you got that idea.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I was just getting in a mid-game hug.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys still got shit to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys made promises, you're still on a timeline for some things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You still have things to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't take that as Sam closing the curtain here. Still got shit to do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know, but... I craved that, so I took it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, that's okay. Cross-table hugs are fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The next morning comes around, you're all in various states of hungover; should you have chosen to imbibe with the rest of the party.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog eventually wanders in, less hungover but more meek about how his previous day was.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I see Vax the next morning and I say, Look, your sister gave me one of her blue feathers. It's because this is the darkest timeline.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I come back and I take that off. I'm like, No, Keyleth, you took that from me when you were drunk last night, actually.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's because this is the darkest timeline and I stole it from you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pike and I come in wearing fun buns, hungover. My face hurts.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, and also my face hurts as well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What did you do last night?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You made the rest of us look and feel like shit?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we all have our ways of coping.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you bake a cake? I hope you baked a cake.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I really want coffee cake right now, Percy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You look like me. Why do you look like me?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're still drunk. Sober up. It's a new day.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) Oh, shit! He could've broken his nose just then, I swear. Oh my god.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought it was still yesterday.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, spells are back, you guys are healed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, wake up, fuck. Wake up. It's a new day. Open your eyes. Hey.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, you're not drunk anymore, look at that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. So, what? First step is the most important one, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, as far as I know we have three things still on our plate.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've got the ashari, and we've got a demon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We also have research we have to look at that we got from that lair of Raishan's.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have to give Ripley's hand to those guys in Marquet. I think that's the easy one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel like if I teleport I'm gonna puke.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I run to the kitchen. I put together something that is not quite, but probably a hot sauce, with half a raw egg, and shot of something that is quite possibly but not quite some sort of fantasy variant of tequila.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's science. Listen to Percy. That's science, you need that and you need a traditional Whitestone breakfast.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, just get it down, just get it down.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just listen to the science guy and chug-a-lug.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was kidding. You shouldn't actually drink that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've done something very similar to that on many a morning.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We need to figure out what Raishan had going on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My brain hurts from crying so much yesterday.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know. Are my eyes puffy?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I have bags under my-- thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what's the plan. What's up first?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's take a quick look at what we got from the cave.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe bring Allura and Gilmore in here, because we have that book that seemed very nefarious.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I help Percy figure things out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. From the things that you gathered off, a lot of them were candle-holders, there were various reagents, some of them rotted or dried out, a number of books and tomes, some that deal with poisons, various alchemy. Actually, a similar book to the one that you found earlier in your travels, but an older version of it. And there is the one large tome that you acquired that had the more nefarious-looking leather-bound exterior, the thicker piece.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want Allura or Gilmore to look at it first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The easiest person to find here would probably be Allura, in the castle. Well, no, because Allura's off in Emon helping with the destruction. Gilmore would be the only one you could really speak to currently.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or Eskil. But he's a little wary of you at the moment. (laughs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just keep making people wary of me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you go ahead and you bring Gilmore in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's just waking up. (yawns) "So, what can I help you with?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We found this. Be careful, it was with Raishan.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Several things have died on top of it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I give my armor a sniff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This is an evil book. Reading this would be informative, but would certainly have a cost."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we have any of that in the bag of holding?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think we do. Not anymore.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What do you recommend we do with this book?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, if you ever feel like you want some light reading. Or find somebody who's foolish enough to read it. Or at least has the willpower to push through its dark enchantments. I have no idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's just keep that in a--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Going to vault that for the moment.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're saying somebody could read it, but they'd have to make it all the way through the end.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's my recommendation at the very least.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not anyone in this room, is what he's saying.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. What else have we got?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I say hand. It's simple, to the point.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And we can find the ashari on the way back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's not on us, though, it's on him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. See where he is, what he's doing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I pull out the scrying eye. Can I hold it out in front-- this is kind of flavor-- and I let it levitate in front.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It locks itself in place and slowly rotates.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I open it like a fortune-teller's spying sphere type of crystal--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And just like project it on the wall behind her so we can watch it like that movie.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The vision comes to you. It doesn't quite do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I want that HD download, not the SD.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, so many lagging issues.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To see if he senses it, maybe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I got a two total. But I get advantage against magic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus your-- what's your wisdom saving throw bonus?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, that's 19, my wisdom is negative two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, minus two. Got you. And your spell DC is--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I'm spying on those bitches.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so. You get a brief view of what looks to be Scanlan, wearing his regular outfit and armor now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He took his armor off? He's just regular clothes?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, he walked out in a fucking nightgown.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He walked out in a nightgown.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Through this whole emotional circumstance, he was in a nightgown. But he is currently, he's walking through the Parchwood Forest that surrounds Whitestone. He is on the path south.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. South of Whitestone. To his left is Kaylie, and they're both with their sacks over their shoulders, and they're just hiking through the forest. They're, at the moment, not talking, but they're both slightly smiling. Just kind of enjoying the journey, and the company. And you just watch them walk for a little bit through the thick tree canopy above, the well-worn path that heads south and out of the Parchwood.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know. He was always an odd one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I never knew his animosity toward trees.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Raven Queen, demons, you never know who's looking over your shoulder.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should've invited Kaylie to come with us. They could've stayed--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's living a nice, happy, content, low-key life now. Let's continue on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, and why shouldn't he, he earned it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He saved the world, what more could we ask of anybody?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's go. What clears the brain better than travel? (sniffs) Or sex.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait, stop, stop. I was about to say you sounded very wise, don't fuck it up. Just, period.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As we head to the tree, I pull Grog aside, and I ask him: Are you all right, Grog? I mean, I know, I know you got your lady favors out of the way and all that, but... Scanlan was your bestie, right? Outside of Pike.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'm just bummed, because I'm glad he's alive--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And now it's just you and Pike.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I mean I trust the others, right, but like... I know you on a more intimate level.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's all. I just-- I just feel a little more sad on the inside. But I'm all right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want to see them? Would that make you feel better?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, it's not right, right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, no, it didn't feel right, I just wanted to... all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you walk your way down to the center of Whitestone, to the Sun Tree--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's so touching and ridiculous at the same time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. You recall that in the center of the city itself, Ank'harel, as it acts as one of the largest oases in the center of the central Marquet desert, there are a number of larger trees of various types, and there's one not too far from the Suncut Bazaar, that you recall. You make that your designated tree, and upon casting the spell, you watch the Sun Tree, tear open the doorway, and you step across--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As I cast the spell, I just say, Hey, Sun Tree? Watch over Scanlan and Kaylie, okay? And then go though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The city is bustling. Lanterns are alight all throughout. The bazaar itself and all the various multicolored towers and structures and buildings, the beautiful city just stretch up in all directions around you. You can see the bazaar itself is lively with carts that are open, shouting as various barkers are peddling their wares. It's a very upbeat atmosphere, and one that's a stark change to the Whitestone you just stepped away from.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And the sun is going down, you said?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The sun has already gone down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Other part of the world.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys begin making your way toward the Debt's Respite, which is the tavern that housed the Scarbearers. This is where Treev Bonebreaker was when you last discussed the return of Ripley's hand--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- as the assassin that killed one of their own. And you're returning this hand to absolve yourselves of implication in this murder.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm, for the record, not wearing the cloak when we do this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys walk through, you catch a few eyes as you are not just outsiders walking through Ank'harel, but you're all adorned in, you know, beautiful artifact armor--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right, we didn't put on our--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: God wear, essentially. And as you walk toward the Debt's Respite tavern, on the outside you can see, there's what looks to be an eight-and-a-half-foot tall, humanoid, golem-like metallic construct. It looks similar to a golem, but it's smaller. Like the iron golems you've fought before, but it's smaller in scale.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like the one we fought in J'mon's.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, J'mon's, but much smaller. It's less bulky, and more just a functional, tall, metallic humanoid-type construct.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A little more ramshackle in construct.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You lot! Hello! Wow! Who are you all? Look at this, magical items from head to toe. Why, I've never seen anything quite like it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Doty, come here, will you? Take this down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (stomping and creaking sounds) And you watch as the giant construct takes a few steps forward and begins writing into the book.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck! It's a kleenex, it doesn't work! You piece of shit!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That couldn't have been more uncanny!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck! I didn't want to throw something hard at him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To accompany me, sort of be my side men, if you will.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How much would a band like you cost for a day?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I tend to employ people on a month-by-month basis, and you get a cut of the treasure as we go, of course. We can work out the particulars, but are you in fact, guns and-- or, not guns. Swords-for-hire?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What, are you going after treasure?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going after many things. I have a long list of things I want to tick off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, you haven't heard of me yet because my book hasn't come out yet. Doty here is recording my legendary adventures as I travel around the continents.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's pretty thick. Make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It's a pretty thick book, but it looks like Doty is maybe a third into it. A fourth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Lots of scribbles in that book.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It will either be-- "Tary's Adventures". It's sort of lame, sort of lame. Or it could be "Daring Adventures of Darrington" or it could be "Tarry On with Taryon". Or something like that, I'm working on the title, I have a while to finish it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The Daring Trial and Tribulations of Tary Darrington.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's fantastic! Doty, please write that down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I knew you were special when I ran into you all, my goodness.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, buddy boy, we have to go to the Nine Hells in the not too distant future, are you down for that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: that is on the list. It was... lower down, but, it's another thing I have to tick off before I'm a real adventurer! So, I'm up for anything if you are.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hm. I do not like you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This fucking asshole, am I right? This fucking asshole.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Look at this willing accomplice motherfucker!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You piece of shit, both of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm so angry at everything right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it perception or what on that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It feels weird. New dad is wearing old dad's skin, and trying to do an impression of him and--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who cares about the whisper, what's going on, Sam?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Tell us about the LootCrate, Sam! Tell us about the LootCrate.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How dare you, Samuel? (gasps) He has a new character sheet. I'm going to cry, again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (yelling) Fuck you, Ryan Green! Fuck you!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This show is breaking apart because of you, Sam!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You were part of this too!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Show me on the character sheet where the bad DM touched you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, bringing it back to current conversation at hand.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're on a very, very dangerous mission.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Percy, what do you feel like--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, what do you do, Tary?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You seem like a person, and that's great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like Kenneth Branagh in Harry Potter.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm trying not to judge at the moment, and--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know. I've had a bad day.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If I tell him to. He also has other skills.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For instance: you, Little Elf Girl, what's your name?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I take it back, I like him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keyleth uses a fog cantrip and just fades into the alleyway.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I rolled a 33 on stealth, I'm gone!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I just hex into the shadows.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like we're in a Western when they cut back to the tavern and everyone's gone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I walk up to him. What kind of adventurer are you if you've never heard of Vox fucking Machina?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh! Is that a band of evildoers, is that a roving goliath horde?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where the fuck have you been? Who are you? No really, who the fuck are you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My name is Taryon Darrington, I am an adventurer, and I have more recently set out on my journey, that is true.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have not seen so many real battles yet, but I have fought many beasts.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There was one, it was a smallish beholder, and my men took it out into a field for me and sort of roughed it up for me, and then when the time was right for the kill, they said "Come on in and kill it!" And I came in and used my powers and killed it and I checked it off the list.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They also perished, that was a different group, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Some of them, I think they do that, typically.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What else is on your list, what're you looking for?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've got a long list of beasts and animals I'd like to slay--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Uh, naga, I think that's how you say it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Someday I'd like to see a dragon, maybe have a crack at it or two.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I'm sure you'd take it out in no time, dear.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Man, I fucking hate this guy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I feel like you're condescending to me! I'm not, I'm not a dullard, here. I can do a lot of things! My wealth has bought me many different artifacts from my travels, and they all do majorly magical things.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What kind of weapons does he have on him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, it's whatever I want it to be. Sword!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as the rod all of a sudden transforms into this sudden liquid, metal-like visage, and then solidifies into a longsword.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How much money did that cost?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, like, 400,000 gold or something? It was a lot of money. I don't quite... Doty keeps the facts and figures. Doty, can you show me that piece of the book?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (mechanical squeaks, pages turning, squeaks). Turns it around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Shows the page to you and you glance through it, and the actual construction of the item cost you upwards around 65 to 70,000 gold.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So wait, you want to come with us, or you want us to come with you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Still getting used to some of the contraptions.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tell you what, Tary? 50,000 gold and you can follow us right now as we finish this very adventurous errand we're running.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What kind of adventure is this, again? You mentioned you're going to do something very dangerous.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you tell me what it is?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm afraid I can't, it's very--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a test of your reflexes, on point, how you handle things you're not quite ready for.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Huddle. Is 50,000 dollars worth dealing with this annoying piece of shit?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: While we go drop off a hand?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look, it just feels like when your guinea pig dies as a kid and then you immediately get another guinea pig to replace it? This doesn't feel good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No! I just, I don't want another guinea pig!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This piece of shit would never replace Scanlan.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's a fabricator! He gets ghostwriters to write all of his books, I bet he does!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He probably does. Keyleth, you don't like him very much, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't like new people right now, as of yesterday!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But like, 50,000 gold and we have ourself a very flamboyant distraction if we need it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Think about it, for 50,000 gold, we're only 15,000 gold away from getting one of those fucking flaming swords!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Look at how fucking cool that rod is!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Look at the battle axe! Holy shit!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You guys, he's like the worst alter-ego version of Percy! He's a rich kid who just buys all of his cool toys. No offense, Percy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's true though! He's not legit!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't like him either, but I'll just say two words: Hotis bait.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh yeah, what if he is Hotis?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He hasn't tried to seduce me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We just have to drop off a hand.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then he's gonna take credit for dropping off a hand, like it's some crazy, miraculous thing!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let him take credit for the hand.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you want credit for dropping off a hand?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No! I don't care. It's the principle of the matter!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there a fighting arena in Marquet, or anywhere we could find a scrap if we wanted to?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, I believe there is. Let me find the name of it real fast.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We also could report in to a certain dragon about things that have happened.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We actually need to because we promised Jarett we would talk to J'mon.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: While Grog's thinking about that, I pull him aside and say Did I ever show you I know how to summon a dragon, d'you know how to do that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do you think of that, big guy?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I grab his hands with the Titanstone Knuckles--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jeepers creepers, you've killed my dragon!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Grog, no, no, let go, Grog drop it, Grog drop --

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Drop it, drop it, good boy!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: See if I ever do anything nice for you again! Jeez!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: D'you need me to make sure you're all right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Will you kiss it? I thought so. And I walk away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Besides I wanna see him get in a fight, let's audition him at least.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Vex, let's let the money tag along.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys decide against your better judgment to accept your companion for the time being--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- you make your way into the Debt's Respite Tavern to meet with Treev Bonebreaker and deliver the right hand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, wait, I wanted that gold up front!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! I don't carry 50,000 gold with me on my person!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, you carry platinum, how much do you have?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Doty, how much platinum does he have on him right now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Doty, show me the ledger. How much platinum does he have on his person right now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Doty only listens to me. If you had some sort of a pet, you would understand.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (gasps) Oh, I'm gonna love Tary so much!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm gonna love him so much.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Gold up front or you don't join us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're like all the bad things about the internet as a character.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a piece of shit silver coin, I don't need your stupid silver coin.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a special coin, you should pick it up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did he flip the coin at her?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was thinking of intercepting it anyway so--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It would be easy to do with your Gloves of Missile Snaring.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, that was for the elf girl but all right, sure, you can use it too. When you need it, if you just hold that coin up, you'll turn invisible.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No! Grog, no! Do not show satisfaction in the things he says.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: MARISHA. Even if you're impressed, we pretend like we're not. Pretend like you're not impressed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not saying I can't be bought--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, hold on! Not impressed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, oh shit, take it back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have no idea where it went, it arced way out of your line of sight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's get the hand to its final destination.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or you can kill him and take the weapon later.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's slow. None of the rest of us like you, so fucking watch it, all right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And with that we embarked on our new adventure! The adventures of, what was it again?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is going to be fun, fun, fun! (all laugh)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You break our hearts and then pull that asshole out?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You asshole! How dare you? How dare you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I am so angry at you!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You were on the Critical Role wikia last night weren't you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, he was, he has it all--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You ain't know all our characters' mothers' names, you motherfucker.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know all of your parents' names.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sam you're the least-- you don't care about any of it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was amazing, it was amazing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I love that-- I wish that everyone could see that the crew is in utter revolt behind us right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And they've all got nerf guns!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Get him! Get him! He deserves it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I'm Tary-ing this-- Tarying this--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Big hand for Sam Riegel, holy shit! [ART]
